tasks.title: Design homepage
tasks.description: Create a modern homepage design with hero section, navigation, and footer. Include responsive design for mobile and desktop.

tasks.title: Implement user authentication
tasks.description: Set up login and registration functionality with JWT tokens and password hashing.

tasks.title: Write API documentation
tasks.description: Document all REST API endpoints with examples and response formats.

tasks.title: Deploy to production
tasks.description: Set up CI/CD pipeline and deploy the application to production environment.

tasks.title: Fix responsive layout issues
tasks.description: Address mobile layout problems on task cards and navigation menu.

tasks.title: Set up database schema
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for user data, tasks, and project management.

tasks.title: Create user profile page
tasks.description: Build a comprehensive user profile page with avatar upload, settings, and preferences.

tasks.title: Implement search functionality
tasks.description: Add global search across tasks, projects, and users with filters and sorting options.

tasks.title: Add notification system
tasks.description: Implement real-time notifications for task updates, mentions, and deadlines.

tasks.title: Build dashboard analytics
tasks.description: Create analytics dashboard with charts showing task completion rates and team productivity.

tasks.title: Implement file upload system
tasks.description: Add file attachment functionality to tasks with drag-and-drop support and preview.

tasks.title: Create team collaboration features
tasks.description: Build team workspace with shared projects, role-based permissions, and activity feeds.

tasks.title: Add calendar integration
tasks.description: Integrate with Google Calendar and Outlook for task scheduling and deadline tracking.

tasks.title: Implement dark mode
tasks.description: Add dark theme support with user preference persistence and smooth transitions.

tasks.title: Build mobile app
tasks.description: Develop React Native mobile application with offline sync capabilities.

tasks.title: Set up error tracking
tasks.description: Integrate Sentry for error monitoring and performance tracking across the application.

tasks.title: Optimize database queries
tasks.description: Review and optimize slow database queries, add proper indexing and caching strategies.

tasks.title: Implement email notifications
tasks.description: Set up email service for task reminders, weekly summaries, and important updates.

tasks.title: Add task templates
tasks.description: Create reusable task templates for common workflows and project types.

tasks.title: Build reporting system
tasks.description: Create comprehensive reporting with exportable charts, time tracking, and productivity metrics.

tasks.title: Implement keyboard shortcuts
tasks.description: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions like creating tasks, navigation, and quick editing.

tasks.title: Add bulk operations
tasks.description: Enable bulk editing, moving, and deleting of multiple tasks simultaneously.

tasks.title: Create onboarding flow
tasks.description: Design and implement user onboarding with interactive tutorials and sample data.

tasks.title: Set up automated testing
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive test suite with unit, integration, and end-to-end tests.

tasks.title: Configure monitoring dashboard
tasks.description: Set up application monitoring with Grafana dashboards for system health and performance.

tasks.title: Implement data backup system
tasks.description: Create automated backup system with point-in-time recovery and disaster recovery procedures.

tasks.title: Add security audit
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit including penetration testing and vulnerability assessment.

tasks.title: Optimize bundle size
tasks.description: Analyze and optimize JavaScript bundle size with code splitting and lazy loading.

tasks.title: Set up CDN
tasks.description: Configure content delivery network for static assets and improved global performance.

tasks.title: Implement caching strategy
tasks.description: Design and implement multi-layer caching with Redis for improved application performance.
